content:
Had a good time camping with Ava and her friend Dylan. 
When we got there it was pissing down with rain. Put up the tent but it was completely full of water. Decided to sleep in the car instead. Next day was sunny so we fixed up the tent. 
Played some board games. Cooked in the kitchen. Swam in the pool and watched the movie. Saw the dam release. 
All in all it was a great time. Teenagers are so awkward. Neither of them really knew what they wanted. Haha. I think they had fun anyway.
